name: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Cooperative Institutes
objective: To increase the effectiveness of research and develop innovative approaches to education in the environmental sciences by facilitating cooperation between government, university, and nonprofit research institutions.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Department of Commerce Appropriation Act of 1999.
Cooperative Agreements/Reimbursement to Further NOAA’s Mission. 15 U.S.C. § 1540.
